EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting The Philadelphia Department of Revenue. You can visit the following website https://ework.phila.gov/revenue to get account information.
If you dispute any balances due, please send a detailed explanation to Revenue@phila.gov. If applicable, be sure to provide proof of payment, such as the front and back of a cancelled check. If you have more questions, please respond to this email.
Please include the case ID number in the subject line of your email.
For your reference, your case number is the following: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Thank you,
